name: Agonism
description:
agonism 

agon + -ism, from Latin agōn, from Ancient Greek ἀγών (agṓn, “contest”).

Pronunciation
    IPA: /ˈæ.ɡəˌnɪ.zəm/
    
n. agonism (plural /agonisms/)
    Competitive struggle (especially political)
    (biochemistry) The relationship between an agonist and a receptor

An interactive fiction where you meet a new game character, an author, and figure out how long you want to play.
